p: From an ecological perspective, the island is characterized by a variety of habitat types including flat coastlines, lagoons, wetlands, marshes, sand dunes, remnants of a Valonia oak ( Quercus ithaburensis Decne. subsp. macrolepis (Kotschy) Hedge & Yalt.) forest, agricultural crops, and extended phrygana [ 16, 18]. Despite its diverse environments, the flora of the island is rather poor compared to neighboring islands, with regard to the number of plant species, but still maintains significant ecological value due to its multifarious vegetation formations [ 17].
